sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Farm Fresh Schools Program Act.
sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Farm Fresh Schools Program Act.

sections.heading: Findings. The General Assembly finds all of the following:
sections.text: Findings. The General Assembly finds all of the following:

sections.heading: Farm Fresh Schools Program.  The Department of Agriculture, in cooperation with the State Board of Education and the Department of Public Health, shall create the Farm Fresh Schools Program
sections.text: The intent of the Program is to reduce obesity and improve nutrition and public health, as well as strengthe

sections.heading: Farm Fresh Schools Program Fund
sections.text: The Farm Fresh Schools Program Fund is created as a special fund in the State treasury. Moneys in the Fund shall be used, subject to appropriation, by the Department of Agriculture and the State Board of Education for the purposes of this Act.

sections.heading: Rules. The Department of Agriculture, with the cooperation of the Department of Public Health and the State Board of Education, shall adopt rules for the implementation of this Act
sections.text: Rules. The Department of Agriculture, with the cooperation of the Department of Public Health and the State Board of Education, shall adopt rules for the implementation of this Act.
